rooms.description: A welcoming space with Vastu-aligned entry facing the east. Incorporates a small foyer for transition.
Connected to the kitchen, features an open-plan living area with large windows allowing natural light and ventilation from the north-east, ensuring positive energy flow.
Integrated into the living space. Designed for functionality while ensuring a harmonious layout per Vastu by placing it in the south-west corner.
Spacious bedroom with east-facing windows to harness the morning light and balanced energy flow, adhering to both colonial aesthetics and Vastu.
Cozy guest room situated towards the west ensuring calmness and privacy. Incorporates storage solutions aligned with Vastu principles for wealth accumulation.
Connected to the guest bedroom, positioned in the north-west area to maintain balance as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A colonial-style archway leading into the entrance hall. Designed with a vestibule for security and climate control.
Secondary access to provide flexibility in layout, ensuring compliance with local building norms.
Large windows on the north-east facade maximizing natural light and ventilation in the living area.
Interior doorways between the living room and kitchen for an open-plan feel while allowing flexibility.
A well-placed staircase connecting to the upper level, ensuring ease of movement and adherence to building norms.

additional_info.building_norms: Adheres to local municipal codes and structural guidelines for duplex residential buildings.
additional_info.vastu_principles: All placements consider Vastu guidelines such as proper directional alignment of rooms, ensuring optimal energy flow and prosperity.

home_theater.description: A dedicated home theater space designed with acoustic considerations, integrated into the living area layout. Features retractable seating and optimized sound insulation per Vastu guidelines.
